last_programmer_output: Task BUG-002 completed: Fixed Matrix room joining by adding room_alias_name parameter to createRoom() call in Home.jsx:287. The fix was a single-line addition: 'room_alias_name: roomName' in the createRoom options object. Client build verified successful with no errors.
